title: A conditional expression is also called a
A statement block is a
answer_2: block that contains a single statement
answer_3: both conditional block and a single statement
answer_4: block that combines multiple statements into a single compound statement
right_answer: block that combines multiple statements into a single compound statement

title: Multiple JS statements are written inside pair of ________ to form a statement block.
JavaScript _________ when there is an indefinite or an infinite value during an arithmetic computation.
The statement a===b refers to _________
answer_1: Both a and b are equal in value and type
answer_2: Both a and b are equal in value, type and reference address
answer_3: Both a and b are equal in value
right_answer: Both a and b are equal in value and type

title: The escape sequence ‘\f’ stands for _________
answer_3: Representation of functions that returns a value

title: Which of the following Attribute is used to include External JS code inside your HTML Document?
The type of a variable that is volatile is _______________
